homeDescription:
The main goal of the game is to eat as many guards as possible.
Eating the right guards increases points, and eating dangerous guards decreases health. As soon as the health pool or time runs out, the game ends. This game can be played alone or with a friend.
author: Author
messageValidationLogin: Must be from 3 to 20 characters. Latin letters, digits (but not consisting of digits), hyphens and underscores are allowed.
messageValidationPassword: Must be from 8 to 40 characters. At least one capital letter and a number are required.
messageValidationName: The first letter must be uppercase. Latin or Cyrillic letters, hyphens are allowed.
messageValidationPhone: From 10 to 15 characters, consists of numbers, can start with a plus
switchLanguage: Are you in Russia, switch the language to Russian?
errorGeolocation: Geolocation is not supported by your browser
Name: Name
Error recording the result of the game: Error recording the result of the game
